message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate from here!
I think a 55/45 split is fair, considering the money is now worth less to me.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still need a bigger share.  Let's split it 60/40. If we don't reach an agreement, the next round will be worse for both of us.
